meanings.definition: A group of descendants or followers, especially those of a famous or noble family.
meanings.sent1: The epigoni of the king were known for their loyalty.
meanings.sent2: The epigoni of the great leader continued his legacy.
meanings.sent3: The epigoni of the queen always wore matching outfits.
meanings.sent4: The epigoni of the legendary warrior inherited his courage.
meanings.sent5: The epigoni of the emperor were as honorable as he was.

meanings.definition: A new generation or era that follows a previous one.
meanings.sent1: The epigoni brought fresh ideas to the kingdom.
meanings.sent2: The epigoni embraced modern technology with enthusiasm.
meanings.sent3: The epigoni threw a party to celebrate the changing times.
meanings.sent4: The epigoni dawned like a bright morning after a long night.
meanings.sent5: The epigoni painted the future with vibrant colors.
